headline: Think It's Too Late to Buy Palantir Stock? Here's the Biggest Reason Why There's Still Time.
summary: The rapid growth of AI makes it difficult to estimate Palantir's total addressable market.  With its share price up roughly 685% over the last 18 months, investors want to know: Is it too late to buy Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) stock?  For growth stocks, one of the key measures of growth potential is total addressable market (TAM).

headline: Why Shares of Palantir Are Surging Today
summary: Palantir's stock is coming off a fresh batch of Wall Street analyst reports.  The stock may also be rising along with defense stocks, due to the escalating conflict in the Middle East.  The stock is coming off several new research reports from Wall Street analysts last week, and also could be benefiting from the escalating conflict in the Middle East.

headline: Will IonQ Stock Trounce Palantir in the Second Half of 2025?
summary: IonQ and Palantir are surfing two big tech waves -- quantum computing and AI.  While Palantir is larger and already profitable, IonQ's revenue could grow faster this year.  Few stocks have been as hot as Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) in 2025.

headline: Where Will Palantir Technologies Stock Be in 1 Year?
summary: An impressive surge in the past few months has boosted Palantir stock to extremely expensive valuation levels.  Palantir's potential to gain a bigger share of the AI software market could propel the stock higher despite the negative sentiment.  Palantir Technologies' (NASDAQ: PLTR) stock has been in crushing form on the market over the past year, rising by a stunning 482% as of this writing.

headline: My Top 5 AI Stocks to Buy Before the Second Half
summary: AI stocks drove market gains over the past two years, but earlier this year they led declines.  Investors, worried about the potential impact of import tariffs on the economy, avoided growth stocks.  The first half of the year was a turbulent one for stocks in general amid concern President Trump's planned import tariffs would hurt the economy.

headline: Billionaire Stanley Druckenmiller Dumped His Entire Stake in Palantir and Has Piled Into This Suddenly Unstoppable Drug Stock for 3 Straight Quarters
summary: Duquesne Family Office's billionaire chief sold every share of Wall Street's hottest artificial intelligence (AI) stock in favor of a drugmaker whose shares have surged 142% in two years.
